nodes.text: FN-2112 was a stormtrooper in the First Order. He notably enjoyed spending time in a hot tub in the barracks inside Starkiller Base.

FN-2112 first appeared in the video game, LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens. The concept of a stormtrooper with only swimwear and a helmet previously appeared in LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy and LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga in the form of Beach troopers, along with the Workout Clone Troopers from LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars.
